caption.p: Most often performed work activities ( n = 202); responses “often” (N and %)

tr.td: Administering drugs ordained by the doctor, including injections and intravenous infusions
Recognizing patients’ nursing needs and health problems
Monitoring, evaluating and interpreting basic vital signs
Providing nursing care for patients with various health states and diseases
Diagnosis, assessment and prevention of health threats in patients
Applying dressings to wounds, bedsores and burns
Collection of material for diagnostic tests
